name: Here Comes The Sun
description:
Okey, so, this "thing" was creater for the GGJ 2017 (go to the page)
You're a sleepless vampire, who must find the keys to it's coffin before dawn. You move with the arrows key or using WASD, open the doors with the space bar and use the sonar to know were you are whit the left shift key

Version 0.2! Now the cinematic Intro It's shown correctly and the walking animation works with the directional arrows! Also some hitbox problems were fixed
